name: Heart and Axe
description:
Something evil has arisen in the land of Hykcin.
Princess Toola goes to find out what's causing it.
The king is furious and sends Orehon to find her. Two stories, one adventure.

  • Heart and Axe is a short 2D roguelike action adventure
  • All Original artwork
  • Single player
  • 10 randomly generated areas
  • xbox One Controller Support
